snippet: VAWTER--Dorothy, born February 26, 1936, died February 21, 2016. A tribute is scheduled for Sunday, April 10, 2pm, Plaza Jewish Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave., New York, NY 10024, 212 769-4400. 1/3
